'''Flowing Sunfire, Also Known as Marishi''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned during ''[[The Entrance to Tokoyo]].''

==Trivia==
*The term {{lang|''Marishi''|zh=摩利支}} is derived from {{w|Marici (Buddhism)|Marici}}, a Buddhist deity associated with light and the Sun who rides on a fiery chariot.
*In Chinese, Japanese, and Korean, the name of the achievement also includes the phrase {{zh|野马泉/野馬泉|rm=yěmǎ quán|tl=wild horse spring/fountain}}, a mythical desert oasis recorded in the travelogues of the Buddhist monk {{w|Xuanzang}}, who is famed for embarking on a seventeen-year journey to India. On its own, the term {{zh|野马/野馬}} describes {{w|Mirage|desert mirages}}, which are said to "flow and ripple like a wild horse's mane."
